days.text: Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Haze in the afternoon. Force 2 to 4 east to southeasterly winds.
Mainly cloudy. Mist in the morning and at night. A few rain patches. Force 3 to 4 east to southeasterly winds.
Cloudy. Mist at first. Occasional showers. A few thunderstorms. Force 2 to 4 east to southeasterly winds with gusts.
Cloudy. Occasional showers. A few thunderstorms. Force 3 to 4 easterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
Mainly cloudy. Mist in the morning and at night. One or two showers. Force 3 to 4 east to southeasterly winds.
